alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:17AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fairfield, Westchester, Orange, Putnam and Rockland Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 817 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Phillipsport to near Bayville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, Bridgeport, Stamford, Norwalk, Danbury, New Rochelle, White Plains, Milford, Shelton, New City, Port Chester, Newburgh, Middletown, Glen Cove and Ossining. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
